name: Disc 11
description: A dedicated open-source Discord bot for Zhycorp based on our Discord bot template with more features. Easy to use, and with no coding required.

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: What is your Discord bot's token? | Example: NTE5NjQ2MjIxNTU2Nzc2OTcw.XAcEQQ.0gjhNbGeWBsKP6FVuIyZWlG2cMd

MAIN_PREFIX.description: What should be the main prefix of your bot? | Example: !

ALT_PREFIX.description: What should be the alternative prefixes of your bot? | Example: ["?", "{mention}"] | Formats: {mention} = bot mention

EMBED_COLOR.description: What should be your bot's embed color code? (hex) | Example: 3CAAFF

LOCALE.description: What should be the language of your bot? Example: en | Available: en, es, id

ACTIVITIES.value: ["My default prefix is {prefix}", "music with {userCount} users", "{textChannelsCount} text channels in {serverCount} guilds", "Hello there, my name is {username}"]

ACTIVITY_TYPES.description: Activity type list. The order of this value is the same as ACTIVITIES. For example, first value of ACTIVITIES will use first value of this | Example: ["PLAYING", "COMPETING"]

OWNERS.description: What is the owner's ID of the bot? | Example: ["319872685897416725", "390045370240991234"]

DEV_GUILD.description: What is your server's ID? | Example: ["332877090003091456"]

NODE_ENV.description: In which mode do you want to activate your bot? | Example: production | Available: production, development

ENABLE_SLASH_COMMAND.description: Do you want to enable slash command support? | Example: yes

MUSIC_SELECTION_TYPE.description: Which music selection type do you want to use? | Example: selectmenu | Available: message (just like in the previous version) or selectmenu (uses discord selection menu)

ENABLE_24_7_COMMAND.description: Do you want to enable the 24/7 command? | Example: no

STAY_IN_VC_AFTER_FINISHED.description: Do you want to make your bot not leave the voice channel after playing a song? | Example: no

DJ_ROLE_NAME.description: What is your server's DJ role name? | Example: DJ

MUTE_ROLE_NAME.description: What is your server's Muted role name? | Example: Muted

YES_EMOJI.description: What should be your bot's emoji for every success sentence? | Example: ✅

NO_EMOJI.description: What should be your bot's emoji for every failed sentence? | Example: ❌
